original: Nahetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
Nahetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
Nahetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetusampayutto ca nahetuvippayutto ca dhammā
analyzed: ▁nahetu sampayutta ṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁nahetu sam pa yutto ▁ca ▁nahetu vippayutt o ▁ca ▁dhammā

original: Nahetuvippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
Nahetuvippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
Nahetuvippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetusampayutto ca nahetuvippayutto ca dhammā
analyzed: ▁nahetu vippayutt aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁nahetu sam pa yutto ▁ca ▁nahetu vippayutt o ▁ca ▁dhammā

original: Nahetusampayuttañca nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ▁nahetu sampayutta ñca ▁nahetu vippayutt añca ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁nahetu sam pa yutto ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁tīṇi ▁saṃkhittaṃ

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate nava. (Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāretabbaṁ.)
